title: robofleet-dashboard
description: The robofleet-dashboard repository provides a web-based interface for monitoring and controlling robotic fleets, built using JavaScript, Python, HTML, and CSS. This project focuses on creating a user-friendly dashboard for visualizing robot status, managing tasks, and interacting with connected robots within a RoboFleet environment. It enables real-time data monitoring and control functionalities crucial for effective fleet management.

title: devboard
description: DevBoard is a full-stack web application built with Next.js 14 (using the pages router) and TypeScript, leveraging MUI for a rich UI experience. This project serves as a modern developer dashboard, utilizing React Query for efficient data fetching and caching. It demonstrates best practices for building scalable and maintainable applications with these technologies, covering topics such as component-based architecture, API integration, and state management.

title: raven-v2
description: Raven-v2 is a personal project built using TypeScript and JavaScript, exploring and showcasing modern web development techniques. This repository serves as a playground for experimentation and implementation of various project ideas, focusing on learning and development best practices within the JavaScript ecosystem. It leverages the strengths of TypeScript for robust typing and JavaScript for dynamic functionality.

title: NextJs-Dashboard
description: NextJs-Dashboard is a project built using TypeScript, CSS, and JavaScript, showcasing a modern and responsive dashboard implementation with Next.js. This repository provides a foundational structure and example components for creating data-rich web applications, serving as a practical learning resource and a starting point for building custom dashboards.

title: resume
description: This repository hosts the source code for my resume, built using TeX for professional formatting and potentially incorporating HTML for online accessibility and interactive elements. It serves as a personal project showcasing skills in document preparation and web development, focusing on presenting my professional background in a clear and concise manner.

title: sleep-debt-tracker
description: Sleep-Debt-Tracker is a project built with TypeScript, JavaScript, CSS, and HTML to help users visualize and manage their sleep debt. It allows users to track their sleep patterns, calculate sleep debt, and provides insights to improve their sleep schedule. Focusing on practical application of TypeScript and modern web development techniques, this repository showcases a functional and user-friendly sleep tracking tool.

title: next-idea-board
description: Next Idea Board is a project leveraging TypeScript, CSS, and JavaScript to create a dynamic and collaborative platform for brainstorming and organizing ideas. This web application provides a visually engaging interface for users to contribute, categorize, and prioritize their ideas, fostering a productive environment for project planning and innovation.

title: next-voting
description: Next-voting is a full-stack, real-time voting application built using Next.js (TypeScript, JavaScript, CSS) designed for creating and participating in polls. This project showcases a modern approach to web development, focusing on a fast and interactive user experience while leveraging the power of Next.js for server-side rendering and efficient routing.

title: jovian
description: Jovian is a CRUD application built with Python, Flask, and PostgreSQL, providing a practical demonstration of building web applications with backend database integration. The project utilizes HTML, CSS, and Shell scripting for front-end presentation and deployment automation, focusing on core concepts related to Python web development and database management.

title: Map-Visualisation
description: Map-Visualisation is a project utilizing HTML and Python to create interactive map visualizations. This repository focuses on presenting geographical data in a visually appealing and informative manner, providing a user-friendly experience for exploring and understanding spatial information. The project covers topics related to data visualization and web development.

title: iot-asset-tracking
description: This repository contains a full-stack web application built with Next.js, TypeScript, Supabase, and Tailwind CSS for tracking IoT assets. It provides a user interface for managing and monitoring the location and status of various assets, leveraging Supabase for backend data storage and authentication, and Tailwind CSS for a responsive and modern design. This project showcases a practical implementation of serverless architecture for IoT asset management and serves as a learning resource for developers interested in Next.js and Supabase.

title: dynamic-event-calendar
description: Dynamic-event-calendar is a JavaScript, CSS, and HTML-based project focused on creating a customizable and interactive event calendar. This project allows users to dynamically add, edit, and display events, providing a user-friendly interface for managing schedules and appointments. The repository showcases practical application of front-end web technologies for building a functional calendar application.

title: finance-with-python
description: This repository, built using Jupyter Notebook and Python, contains a collection of finance-related projects and tutorials. It explores various financial concepts and demonstrates practical applications through Python code, aiming to provide a hands-on learning resource for individuals interested in leveraging programming for financial analysis, modeling, and data exploration. The projects cover topics such as portfolio optimization, risk management, and stock market analysis.

title: atg-world
description: atg-world is a project built using TypeScript, JavaScript, HTML, and CSS, exploring and implementing [mention key functionality from README, e.g., interactive maps, data visualization, user authentication].  This repository serves as a playground for experimentation with modern web development techniques and demonstrates [mention a specific goal, e.g., building a single-page application with a dynamic user interface].

title: ros-log-viewer
description: Ros-log-viewer is a web-based tool developed using JavaScript, Python, HTML, CSS, and Shell scripting for visualizing and analyzing ROS (Robot Operating System) log files. This project provides a user-friendly interface to parse, filter, and display ROS log data, facilitating easier debugging and understanding of robot system behavior. It's designed to improve the ROS development workflow by offering a clear and interactive view of log information.

title: genietalks
description: GenieTalks is a full-stack web application built with TypeScript, Vite.js, and Express.js, leveraging the Gemini API to provide a conversational AI experience. This project showcases the integration of modern web technologies with AI models, enabling users to interact with an AI agent through a dynamic and responsive interface styled with CSS and enhanced with JavaScript.

title: fruit-seller
description: Fruit-seller is an e-commerce project built with Next.js 14 using the Pages Router, TypeScript, and JavaScript. It leverages React Query for efficient data fetching and MUI for a modern user interface. This project aims to provide a type-safe and performant platform for selling fruits online, encompassing key aspects of modern web development and e-commerce functionality.
